entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:48 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 1:41 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: SSW 45 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blizzard developing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
